---
title: "Tests"
---

## Statistical Tests

### t-test

```r
t.test(score ~ group, data = data)
```

### Paired t-test

```r
t.test(data$pre, data$post, paired = TRUE)
```

### One-way ANOVA

```r
aov(score ~ condition, data = data) |> summary()
```

### Chi-square test

```r
chisq.test(table(data$group, data$outcome))
```

### Correlation

```r
cor.test(data$x, data$y)
```
